text: Burmeistera brachyandra is a species of plant in the family Campanulaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador brachyandra Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1943
title: Burmeistera brachyandra
